examples.korean: mathematical expression 듣기 Add to Wordbook 수식. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
In ‘speak quietly’, the adverb ‘quietly’ is a modifier. 듣기 Add to Wordbook speak quietly에서는 부사인 quietly가 수식어이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In ‘speak quietly’, the adverb ‘quietly’ is a modifier. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In ‘walk slowly’, the adverb ‘slowly’ modifies the verb ‘walk’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook walk slowly에서 부사인 slowly는 동사인 walk를 수식한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In ‘walk slowly’, the adverb ‘slowly’ modifies the verb ‘walk’. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In ‘run fast’, the adverb ‘fast’ is a postmodifier. 듣기 Add to Wordbook run fast에서 부사 fast는 후치 수식어이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In ‘run fast’, the adverb ‘fast’ is a postmodifier. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In ‘a loud noise’, the adjective ‘loud’ is a premodifier. 듣기 Add to Wordbook a loud noise에서 형용사 loud는 전치 수식어이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In ‘a loud noise’, the adjective ‘loud’ is a premodifier. Add to Wordbook
